text: Fuller House actress Jodie Sweetin has obtained a restraining order against her ex, Justin Hodak. Sweetin, 35, and Hodak, 40, just broke up after a year long engagement and Sweetin went on to get a restraining order. The court order required Hodak to stay 100 yards away from her, her job, her home, her children ’ s school and her vehicle. It also prohibited Hodak from contacting Sweetin in any way whether directly or indirectly. Hodak arrested The ex - fiancé clearly could not adhere to the restraining order and was arrested at Sweetin ’ s Sherman Oaks home in Carlifonia on Monday.
